job.title: Wanted: Railslovin’ Frontend Developer (m/f)
job.description:
Required Skills and Experience
at least 3 years professional experience of developing web applications in Ruby on Rails, an expert knowledge of HTML & CSS – contributions to the Ruby/Rails community are a big plus
at least 2 years experience of working in a team environment
working knowledge of version control with git
experience with jQuery – plugin development experience a plus
working knowledge of Haml and SASS
experience with test-driven development and agile software delivery
great written communication and documentation skills

Even better if you have
experience with Linux/Unix server configuration and maintenance – experience with Rails application deployment and Capistrano a plus
run a couple side projects to show us
contributed to open source projects

Additional Expectations
approach your work with an open, flexible attitude and a focus on innovation
maximize your time and output by thinking creatively and working smart, not just hard
About Us

We’re an international team of Rails professionals who work for (start-up) companies as developers and consultants, but also push forward our own SaaS projects. Our workflow follows the principles of agile software development, which inlcudes daily calls, honest retrospectives, and a story-driven planning process. We are committed to deliver high quality software for our clients.
Our team members are living in and working from various European cities (currently Cologne, Berlin, Bremen, and Bath (UK)), which means you don’t have to work at our headquarters in Cologne - although it’s a really nice place.
If you’re interested, please send us

your github username
a short description of something really cool you’ve worked on – code or tech-related, preferably a project of your own
We’re excited to hear from you at team@railslove.com.
